attributes.action: fixx  up the sewage outlets in the Thames so that we can make the river cleaner
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are upset about our lovely river being full of untreated sewage. It kills the wildlife around the river; it puts tourists off the capital and ruins water sports.
attributes.creator_name: Catherine Neale, Molly Reid, Abi Magrill, Unaiza Tughral, Charlotte Tidman, Caroline Seeds-Williams
